item.title: Europe to suspend approval of US tariffs deal
item.description: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

item.title: UK defends Chagos deal after Trump calls it 'act of great stupidity'
item.description: The US president says it is "another in a very long line of National Security reasons why Greenland has to be acquired".

item.title: Lyse Doucet: Trump is shaking the world order more than any president since WW2
item.description: Trump's demands over Greenland are a rude awakening in a moment fraught with risk.

item.title: Ukraine's parliament and half of Kyiv with no heating after Russian strikes
item.description: President Zelensky says Russia has started using "far more" ballistic missiles in its attacks on Ukraine.

item.title: Shock and confusion as Spain struggles for answers after deadly train crash
item.description: Investigators remain baffled by the cause of Sunday's deadly crash in the south of the country.
